name: Shinpi no Sekai El-Hazard
overview: Shinpi no Sekai El-Hazard (English Patched) (神秘の世界エルハザード) is a Adventure video game published by AIC Spirits & Pioneer LDC, Rob Jinnai released on May 1, 2003 for the GameBoy Advance. The story go by Makoto and his companion got trap into another uknown world and Makoto have been chosen as savior by pray of the princess.
